about_the_game:
The Talos Principle: Reawakened Demo invites you to explore a breathtaking medieval environment filled with intricate puzzles and thought-provoking challenges.

Experience a carefully curated taste of puzzles from the full game, including key mechanics like laser connectors, force-field jammers, and pressure plates.

Solving puzzles is only the beginning. Try your hand at using the fully-featured Puzzle Editor. This tool allows you to build unique worlds and challenges, fosters creativity, and empowers our modding community to ensure a thriving future for The Talos Principle.

The Talos Principle: Reawakened Demo offers a glimpse into the vast, philosophical journey that awaits you. Play it now and see why critics and players hail The Talos Principle as one of the best puzzle adventures ever.

Experience a carefully curated taste of puzzles from the full game, including key mechanics like laser connectors, force-field jammers, and pressure plates.

Solving puzzles is only the beginning. Try your hand at using the fully-featured Puzzle Editor. This tool allows you to build unique worlds and challenges, fosters creativity, and empowers our modding community to ensure a thriving future for The Talos Principle.

movies.name: The Talos Principle: Reawakened | Gameplay Sizzle

name: The Talos Principle: Reawakened Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 (version 2004 or newer)
  • Processor: 4 core CPU @ 2.5 GHz (AMD Ryzen 5, Intel core i3/i5)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM; Radeon RX 470, GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Intel integrated GPUs are not supported. SSD recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 (version 2004 or newer)
  • Processor: 6 or 8 core CPU @ 3.0 GHz (AMD Ryzen 7, Intel core i5/i7)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8+ GB VRAM; Radeon RX 6800, GeForce RTX 3070, Intel Arc B580
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Intel integrated GPUs are not supported. SSD recommended.

short_description: The Talos Principle: Reawakened Demo invites you to explore a breathtaking medieval environment filled with intricate puzzles and thought-provoking challenges.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
